meanings.definition: A plant of the buttercup family with spear-shaped leaves.
meanings.sent1: The spearwort in the garden has long, pointy leaves.
meanings.sent2: The spearwort is a beautiful flower with sharp leaves.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the spearwort leaves to play 'sword fighting'.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like spearwort, sharp and piercing.
meanings.sent5: The spearwort plant stood out in the field with its distinctive leaves.

meanings.definition: Any plant of the genus Ranunculus.
meanings.sent1: I saw a lovely spearwort by the pond today.
meanings.sent2: The spearwort bloomed brightly in the meadow.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended the spearwort was a magical plant granting wishes.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as radiant as a field of spearwort in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The spearwort added a splash of color to the otherwise green landscape.
